import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' import Navbar from './Navbar'; import DisplayError from './DisplayError' import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; const initialState = { data: { skills: '', company: '', portfolio: '', linkedIn: '', instagram: '', facebook: '', twitter: '', college: '', degree: '', branch: '', batch: '', cfUserName: '', cfRating: '', cfMaxRating: '', cfRank: '', ccUserName: '', ccRating: '', ccMaxRating: '', ccRank: '' }, errors: { cfUserNameError: '', ccUserNameError: '', collegeError: '', }, } function AddProfile(){ const [ profile, setProfile ] = useState({ data: { skills: '', company: '', portfolio: '', linkedIn: '', instagram: '', facebook: '', twitter: '', college: '', degree: '', branch: '', batch: '', cfUserName: '', cfRating: '', cfMaxRating: '', cfRank: '', cfMaxRank: '', ccUserName: '', ccRating: '', ccMaxRating: '', ccRank: '', ccMaxRank: '', githubUserName: '' }, errors: { cfUserNameError: '', ccUserNameError: '', githubUserNameError: '' }, }) const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.all([ axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codeforces/${profile.data.cfUserName}`), axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codechef/${profile.data.ccUserName}`), axios.get(`https://api.github.com/users/${profile.data.githubUserName}/repos`) ]).then(axios.spread((res1, res2, res3) => { let cfUserNameError='', ccUserNameError=''; if(res1.data.status==='Failed'){ cfUserNameError = 'Please enter valid codeforces handle' } if(res2.data.status==='Failed'){ ccUserNameError = 'Please enter valid codechef handle' } if(cfUserNameError || ccUserNameError) { return setProfile({ ...profile, errors: { cfUserNameError, ccUserNameError }}) } console.log(res1) console.log(res2) console.log(res3.response.data.message) })).catch((error) => { if(error.response.data.message==='Not Found'){ setProfile({ ...profile, errors: { cfUserNameError:profile.errors.cfUserNameError, ccUserNameError:profile.errors.ccUserNameError, githubUserNameError }}) } //console.log(profile.errors) //console.log(error.response.data.message) }) } return (

My account

onSubmit(e) } >
Education and Profesional Details
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, college: e.target.value}}) } required />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, degree: e.target.value}}) } required />

setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, portfolio: e.target.value}}) } />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, linkedIn: e.target.value}}) } />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, instagram: e.target.value}}) } />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, twitter: e.target.value}}) } />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, facebook: e.target.value}}) } />


) } export default AddProfile;
